contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.communi.CommunityGroupContentDescriptionHTML:
The Kentico User Group UK aims to connect professionals who use Kentico DXP to share knowledge, experiences, and best practices. Whether you are a seasoned expert or a new user, this group provides a platform to collaborate, learn, and grow together.

What We Offer

  • Networking Opportunities: Connect with other Kentico users and professionals in the UK.
  • In-Person Meetups: Regular events and meetups across the UK to discuss the latest in Kentico DXP, share experiences, and learn from each other.
  • Expert Insights: Access to valuable insights and tips from Kentico experts and industry leaders.
  • Support and Collaboration: A supportive environment to ask questions, seek advice, and collaborate on projects.

Who Should Join

  • Kentico Developers
  • Digital Marketers
  • Content Managers
  • Project Managers
  • Anyone interested in Kentico DXP technology

Join Us

Become a part of our vibrant community to enhance your Kentico skills, expand your professional network, and stay updated with the latest industry trends. We look forward to your participation and contribution to the Kentico User Group UK.
